author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: Game Asset Minting Logic [Revelar]
description: 基本的なNFTの鋳造APIは存在しますが、ゲームで必要なオンデマンドの鋳造ロジックを考慮していません。

f6_assessments.q0:
The team proposes that they will develop a minting logic to help game developers/ teams less spend time on integrating with Cardano, this will help game developers save a lot of time and have more resources for designing their game. Therefore, this will make an impact on the game development in Cardano ecosystem. 
The team also shows their potential KPI that mostly is the number of assets that will be mint by their service, and ADA value that they help to create after success of 6 months. Absolutely, all of these metrics is align with the challenge givens.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team shares a short roadmap that divides into sprint work of 2-4 weeks periods, wish that they can provide more detail about the implementation plan for this project to help assess their progress better. The budget they require is enough only for development progress and it's reasonable with their work-time will use. 
Browsing all of the attached profiles of this team, I believe that they can handle work in the scope of this proposal, but the team should have more detail about their solution instead of just features introductions. And they also need to think about some risks that they will meet when implementing this project, it maybe couldn't from the development team but for achieving the goal there is some marketing plan that I believe we can meet some risk.
f6_assessments.q2:
They have a roadmap that divides into 2 weeks periods and outlined KPIs that will help Catalyst community audit the project clearly. 
The team also has a great view of the problem context that was described into examples. It helps easier to understand the standing problem then helps us understand how the solution can solve it effectively. So, I think all the detail in the proposal are clear and concentrate on what the team wants, and they're all clarified.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal is perfectly in-line with the Challenge, offering a much needed part to fully integrate the NFTs into gaming - minting on demand logic. The proposal adds value by providing a full game engine, built on Cardano and utilizing Cardano NFTs.
Metrics are clearly presented in the form of issued assets in time intervals.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposing team is well experienced company already building the game engine on Cardano. All team members have verifiable links to their qualifications.
The budget involves mainly personnel and is clearly defined based on the hourly rates.
The timeline is very specific and implementable. The risks have not been addressed, but given the teams overall expertise I will not reduce a point.
f6_assessments.q2:
A roadmap and deliverables are clearly defined as well as metrics. The proposal clearly addresses the challenge by providing Cardano gaming engine and possibility to mint NFTs on demand in the games. 
Metrics and deliverables are clear and easily controllable.
Overall, a very solid proposal with a wider impact on the Cardano gamer dev and community, fully aligned with the Challenge.

f6_assessments.q0: The Proposer wants to contribute to create mint sequences for game developers. A bit more explanation of the project to make it easy to understand would help. Hence my 3 star rating.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer is a tech founder and CTO, a Plutus Pioneer, Fund 6  and has a team of engineers who are capable of implementing the project successfully. The plan is detailed mentioning that the minting engine will expand a traditional minting services with wallet content validator , create off-chain data triggers and have full minting webapp, etc. I think the project can be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: Success can be measured easily with the points given such as the number of unique projects that use the website developed, number of assets created and mint day value (ADA) of CNFTs. The road map has clearly shown 3 , 6, and 12 months of specific work schedules and the budget is broken down well for easy auditing.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem needing to be solved has been identified and articulated namely While basic NFT minting API's exist, they don't account for minting on demand logic needed in games.
 
 
  
This proposal falls within the scope of the challenge brief beause it would add minting logic to the Revelar game engine to create powerful mint sequences for game developers.

 
 
This proposal shows clearly how it will add value to the Cardano System by enabling gamers to use minting logic to create powerful sequences for game developers.
 
Key metrics and goals of the proposal have been stated clearly 
Number of unique projects that use this website (targeting non-developers)

Number of assets created through our generator be minted as a CNFT for gaming & % that end up being minted.

Mint day value (ADA) of CNFT's that contain assets created by our generator.

Our 3 month goal after v1 of the website is live is 5 projects with > 10,000 assets each.

Our 6 month goal is 10 projects with > 10,000 assets each.

Our 12 month goal is 25 projects with > 10,000 assets each

 
Key metrics and goals of the proposal fall within the scope of the challenge. 


The proposal can be scaled to address future challenges  by bringing ne functionality.

This project will have a positive impact on Cardano system
